text:
Rocket Fuel | Web Applications Developer (fulltime) | ONSITE | https://rocketfuel.com/

Looking for frontend developers to help port our existing platforms into an integrated UI build with React and Redux.

Hiring process: coding challenge > phone interview > on-site interview with team.

Contact: thwang@rocketfuelinc.com

Job description: http://app.jobvite.com/m?3GJgqiwS
